enumDescriptions.Manual: Completed tasks are not automatically overwritten.

TaskService.description: The TaskService schema describes a task service that enables management of long-duration operations, includes the properties for the task service itself, and has links to the resource collection of tasks.
TaskService.longDescription: This resource contains a task service for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CompletedTaskOverWritePolicy.description: The overwrite policy for completed tasks.  This property indicates if the task service overwrites completed task information.
CompletedTaskOverWritePolicy.longDescription: This property shall contain the overwrite policy for completed tasks.  This property shall indicate if the task service overwrites completed task information.

DateTime.description: The current date and time, with UTC offset, setting that the task service uses.
DateTime.longDescription: This property shall contain the current date and time for the task service, with UTC offset.

LifeCycleEventOnTaskStateChange.description: An indication of whether a task state change sends an event.
LifeCycleEventOnTaskStateChange.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether a task state change sends an event.  Services should send an event containing a message defined in the Task Event Message Registry when the state of a task changes.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ServiceEnabled.description: An indication of whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this service is enabled.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Tasks.description: The links to the collection of tasks.
Tasks.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type TaskCollection.

title: #TaskService.v1_0_9.TaskService
